avSummary: light(s) 114, day 2, bright 1, clear 1, flood 1, herbs 1, lightning 1, morning 1, sun 1
definition:
1) light
    1a) light of day
    1b) light of heavenly luminaries (moon, sun, stars)
    1c) day-break, dawn, morning light
    1d) daylight
    1e) lightning
    1f) light of lamp
    1g) light of life
    1h) light of prosperity
    1i) light of instruction
    1j) light of face (fig.)
    1k) Jehovah as Israel's light
